author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Thai Ticon Says Plans To Develop 1,500 Rai (240 Hectares) Of Land In Eastern Economic Corridor
text:
March 6 (Reuters) - Thailandâ€™s TICON Industrial Connection Pcl:
* SAYS TARGETS AT LEAST 15 PERCENT REVENUE GROWTH EACH YEAR FOR 2018-2020
* SAYS REVENUE IN 2020 TO REACH AT LEAST 5 BILLION BAHT ($159.39 MILLION)
* SAYS PLANS TO DEVELOP 1,500 RAI (240 HECTARES) OF LAND IN EASTERN ECONOMIC CORRIDOR
* SAYS CONSIDERING INVESTING IN VIETNAM * SAYS WILL SELL 3.5 BLN BAHT OF ASSETS INTO REAL ESTATE TRUST (TREIT) BY THIRD QUARTER THIS YEAR Further company coverage: ($1 = 31.3700 baht) (Reporting by Chayut Setboonsarng)
